title: Actively Managing Cannabis With Tim Seymour
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Why aren't US cannabis stocks reflecting more fundamental bullish developments? CNBC's Tim Seymour joins Rena Sherbill to discuss this and his actively managed ETF, CNBS. Top line revenue will be very robust this year. SAFE Banking and waiting to hear what happens in Texas. Cannabis coverage on CNBC, understanding US and Canadian opportunities. It's about finding the companies building the foundation for a consumer products industry as well as the innovations leapfrogging other technologies. Learn more about your ad choices.
